    • areEnoughResourcesPresentForBuyAndProduction

      public boolean areEnoughResourcesPresentForBuyAndProduction​(java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToEliminateWarehouse, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToEliminateExtraDeposit, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToEliminateChest)
      double checks if the resources indicated by the user are actually present usable in "isFeasible" and "perform" methods only within BuyDevCardMoveand DevCardProductionMove
      Parameters:
      resourcesToEliminateWarehouse - resources we want to select from the warehouse
      resourcesToEliminateExtraDeposit - resources we want to select from the extradeposit
      resourcesToEliminateChest - resources we want to select from the chest
      Returns:
      it returns true if the resources are right, false if they are not

      resourcesToCheck - map to check in the warehouse or chest or extra-deposit
      Returns:

      it checks if the move Buy Development Card it makes sense
      Parameters:
      devCard - card to buy
      resourcesToEliminateWarehouse - resources selected from the warehouse
      resourcesToEliminateExtraDeposit - resources selected from the extradeposit
      resourcesToEliminateChest - resources selected from the chest
      position - position of the card where I want to put it
      Returns:
      it returns true if all checks are passed, false if not

    • isFeasibleProductionMove

      public boolean isFeasibleProductionMove​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> devCardIDs, java.util.List<java.lang.String> leaderCardIDs, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> requiredResources, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToEliminateWarehouse, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToEliminateExtraDeposit, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToEliminateChest, ProductionType productionType)
      it checks if the production Move is feasible
      Parameters:
      devCardIDs - ids of the developmentCards selected fro the production
      leaderCardIDs - ids of the leaderCards selected for the production
      requiredResources - resources required for the production
      resourcesToEliminateWarehouse - resources selected from the warehouse
      resourcesToEliminateExtraDeposit - resources selected from the extraDeposit
      resourcesToEliminateChest - resources selected from the chest
      productionType - enum of the productionType
      Returns:
      true is the action is feasible, false if not

    • performProductionMove

      public void performProductionMove​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> devCardIDs, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToEliminateWarehouse, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToEliminateExtraDeposit, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> resourcesToEliminateChest, ProductionType productionType, ResourceType boardManufacturedResource, java.util.List<ResourceType> perkManufacturedResources)
      performs the production putting the resources manufactured in the strongbox and eliminating the resources required
      Parameters:
      devCardIDs - ids of developmentCards selected by the user
      resourcesToEliminateWarehouse - resources selected from the warehouse
      resourcesToEliminateExtraDeposit - resources selected from the extraDeposit
      resourcesToEliminateChest - resources selected from the chest
      productionType - enum of the productionType
      boardManufacturedResource - resources manufactured by the board
      perkManufacturedResources - resources manufactured from the perk
